headline: How Recent Moves Are Rewriting the Earnings Story for Franklin Resources
summary: Franklin Resources has seen only a marginal tweak to its price target, with fair value estimates holding steady around $24.73 per share while the discount rate edges slightly higher and long term revenue growth assumptions remain largely intact. This subtle recalibration reflects a market narrative caught between recent performance driven upside and lingering doubts about how durable that strength will be. Read on to see how you can track these nuanced shifts in expectations and stay updated...

headline: ‘2026 Year Ahead’: Bank of America Picks 2 Stocks to Buy as the Market Moves from Hype to Earnings
summary: The countdown to the new year has begun, and Wall Street is already planning its next chapter. Major institutions and top-tier analysts are sketching out their playbooks for the year ahead – and after a strong run in the markets, these forecasts are shaping how investors prepare their next moves. Enter Savita Subramanian, Bank of America’s equity and quant strategist. headline: Bank of America Corporation (BAC) to Start Recommending Crypto Allocations
summary: ​Bank of America Corporation (NYSE:BAC) is one of the Cheap NYSE Stocks to Buy Now.
